Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Jsonable
public class Player extends Object implements Jsonable
This class implements the player inside the model.

      public int getPersonalGoalPoints()
      To check how many points the player currently has achieved with the personal goal. Note: this method is pure and runs the check when called.
      Returns:
      integer.

      public int getAdjacentPoints()
      To check how many points the player currently has achieved by placing tiles of the same type in adjacent positions.
      Returns:
      integer.

    • getCommonGoalPoints

      public int getCommonGoalPoints()
      To check how many points the player currently has achieved with the common goals.
      Returns:
      integer, the value is stored in the player.

    • getCheckedCommonGoals

      public List<Integer> getCheckedCommonGoals()
      Should be called to save which goals the player already has achieved.
      Returns:
      list of Integers.

    • checkCommonGoals

      public void checkCommonGoals(List<CommonGoal> goals)
      Runs the checks with the provided personal goals: passes the shelf to the goal; if the goal is achieved and was not previously achieved, pops points from the goal and saves them.
      Parameters:
      goals - list of AbstractCommonGoals to be checked.

    • insertTile

      public void insertTile(Tile tile, int column) throws BadPositionException
      To edit the shelf.
      Parameters:
      tile - Tile enum,
      column - int.
      Throws:
      BadPositionException

    • hasFinished

      public boolean hasFinished()
      Uses getHighestColumn on the shelf to determine if the player has completed the shelf.
      Returns:
      true/false.

    • getVirtualShelf

      public VirtualShelf getVirtualShelf()
      This method is used to get the virtual shelf, it'll be used to send updates when the status changes.
      Returns:
      virtual shelf object
